speakerDialogue: Hey you. You’re finally awake. You were trying to cross the border right? Walked right into that monster ambush but I managed to get you out in time.
I can't remember… thanks for getting me out though.
No problem... wait… Did you hear that? The monsters are coming back for seconds!
That doesn't matter all you need to know now is that those monsters? They are coming back again!
Here grab this equipment and get ready to fight! They'll be coming in waves so grab what you can from them!
I think that's the last of them… Are you there Folar?
Yes. You handle yourself very well! Now let's keep moving
Wait. Where are we even going?
How did these enemies even come about?
We need to go to the next area ahead of us. There are more monsters to be wiped out and I could use your help… Wait what's that?
They come from the dark areas of the world and we need to head there to stop them by killing their leader… Watch out!
I see you're having fun killing my minions… You will regret doing so when we meet.
